title: Neko Ni Tenseishita Kedo Hima Nano De Gamer Joshi To Issho Ni Vrmmo Wo Suru
alternative_title: I Got Reincarnated as a Cat, but Since I’m Bored, I Play VRMMOs With Gamer Girls ; 猫に転生したけど、暇なのでゲーマー女子と一緒にＶＲＭＭＯをする ; Neko ni Tenseishita kedo Hima nano de Geema Joshi to Issho ni VRMMO wo suru
status: I Got Reincarnated as a Cat, but Since I’m Bored, I Play VRMMOs With Gamer Girls ; 猫に転生したけど、暇なのでゲーマー女子と一緒にＶＲＭＭＯをする ; Neko ni Tenseishita kedo Hima nano de Geema Joshi to Issho ni VRMMO wo suru
description:
Description :
        I am a cat. My name is Nanahoshi. In my previous life, my name was Hokuto Kurokawa. I lost my life in an unexpected accident. I was then reincarnated, not as a human, but as a cat...! Moreover, not in another world, but in the same world just several years in future...! But don't worry, because I was taken in by a household that has a full dive VRMMO that even cats can play. The game world basically takes the place of another world! Because of this, I might even be able to use cheats in this world(game world)!?Alongside my master, the super popular actress "Kanako Nakamura," her popular voice actress friend "MYU," and many pretty NPCs. I should be able to have my fill of adventure inyaa this game world(Isekai.)

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: The Mystery Of Charging
Vol.1 Chapter 1: My Idendity As A Cat And The Reason I Started The Game
